google_translated: It seems to come to near octake-

en_text: Are you able to meet me now?
jp_text: 今から 会っていただけないでしょうか？
google_translated: Could you meet now?

en_text: Sorry, I'll have to call you later.
jp_text: 悪い あとで連絡する
google_translated: Contact afterward

en_text: Hold on! I'll open the door!
jp_text: はい 今 開けます
google_translated: Yes open now
